body:
Brian,

That is one of the main pages I am working from. Thanks for your help.

-Richard J.

On Fri, Jun 9, 2017 at 5:21 AM, Brian Bockelman <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> There shouldn't be any changes you have to do on your side, but it's worth
> to double-check with an email to Edgar. He should also be able to provide
> information about how to request execution of a job inside a particular
> Singularity container. I think this page *may* apply: https://support.
> opensciencegrid.org/support/solutions/articles/12000024676-singularity-
> containers
>
> —
